enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: Methods and tools to evaluate impacts and adaptation:
sentences: Noting the complexity of methodologies, CANADA proposed that regional workshops on integrated assessment include consideration of impacts and adaptation.
Supported by MALAYSIA, he suggested that the technology information system also include impacts and adaptation.
MALAYSIA and THAILAND proposed joint research projects between developed and developing countries.
Chair Dovland said informal consultations would be held.
